narrative_note: 79-year-old Female with a history of type 2 diabetes diagnosed 7 years ago. Seen for routine outpatient follow-up. Reports mild fatigue. Current therapy: Metformin 500 mg BID (patient reports intolerance to higher dose); Losartan 50 mg daily. Home glucose readings: fasting 120–160 mg/dL. Comorbidities: dyslipidemia; obesity. Denies hypoglycemia requiring assistance. Last HbA1c on 2025-11-29 was 8.1%. Plan: optimize regimen and follow-up in 8–12 weeks. Not eligible for cohort due to: Age outside inclusion range (79 years).
